skill_e.tooltip: Deals 20/30/40/50/60 physical damage plus 15/20/25/30/35 (+0.2) (+?) per stack of Deadly Venom to all nearby enemies affected by Deadly Venom. (Max Stack Damage: ?)

skill_i.tooltip: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

skill_q.tooltip:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged and gains 10% Movement Speed for 10/11/12/13/14 seconds. This bonus triples when he is nearby an enemy champion that cannot see him.

Twitch gains 30/35/40/45/50% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after exiting Ambush. Ambush resets when a champion dies while affected by Deadly Venom.

Stealth - Camouflage: Twitch is hidden from view while enemy champions remain outside his detection radius. Attacking or casting spells ends Camouflage.

skill_r.tooltip:
For 5 seconds Twitch gains 300 Attack Range and 20/30/40 Bonus Attack Damage.

For the duration, his basic attacks become piercing bolts that deal 20% less damage to subsequent targets, down to a minimum of 40% damage.

Stealth - Camouflage: Activating Spray and Pray does not end Camouflage.

skill_w.tooltip:
Twitch hurls a cask that adds a stack of Deadly Venom to all enemies struck and leaves behind a toxic cloud that persists for 3 seconds.

Enemies that remain within the cloud have 25/30/35/40/45% reduced Movement Speed and receive an additional stack of Deadly Venom each second.
